subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: In the second-biggest upset in Kentucky Derby history, Mine That Bird, a 50-1 shot ridden by Calvin Borel, ran away from the field at Churchill Downs on Saturday.
snippet: In the second-biggest upset in Kentucky Derby history, Mine That Bird, a 50-1 shot ridden by Calvin Borel, ran away from the field at Churchill Downs on Saturday.
